actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the founding of America's National Parks, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Park Anniversaries--Great American Spaces Commemorative Coin Act

summary.text: National Parks Anniversaries-Great American Spaces Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue silver coins emblematic of certain National Parks that are observing historic anniversaries of their founding.

titles.title: National Park Anniversaries--Great American Spaces Commemorative Coin Act
A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the founding of America's National Parks, and for other purposes.
